weather_report:
As the sun begins its descent and the evening approaches, a gentle breeze carries the whispers of the Bay through Downtown San Francisco. The forecast hints at a slight possibility of drizzle in the hours before dawn, yet the golden glow of the late afternoon reveals a predominantly clear, partially cloudy sky overhead. Current temperatures hover around a comfortable 56 degrees, and the west-southwest winds create a refreshing ambience, gusting lightly at times, just enough to tousle your hair and invigorate your spirit.

Tomorrow promises an inviting sun-soaked day, with highs reaching approximately 65. The air, kissed by the ocean's cool embrace, will gradually warm through the afternoon, embodying that quintessential San Francisco charm. As twilight settles, the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge emerges against the vibrant hues of the sunset. As for attire, a light jacket or sweater will serve you well in the coolness of the evening, while layers will be the prudent choice for the day ahead, allowing you to adjust as the warmth of the sun invites short sleeves. Whether you opt for a quiet stroll along the waterfront or engage in your favorite ritual of savoring a good book at a cozy café, this evening beckons with a sense of calm and simplicity, reminding you to appreciate the beauty that surrounds you.
